summary: How much revenue does the U.S. government collect? What does it cost to run the government for a year? How and where is the money spent? The Financial Report of the U.S. Government may have a lot of these answers, including information about taxes and major program costs. But we audit the financial statements in that report each year, to see whether they fairly present...
title: Financial Audit: Fiscal Years 2018 and 2017 Consolidated Financial Statements of the U.S. Government
topics: Consolidated Financial Statements of the U.S. Government
